abstract: The penalty is the largest single federal fine against an automaker and accuses Toyota of failing to notify the government about defective pedals promptly.
snippet: The penalty is the largest single federal fine against an automaker and accuses Toyota of failing to notify the government about defective pedals promptly.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — The Transportation Department said Monday it would seek a $16.4 million fine against Toyota, the largest allowed, because the company had failed to promptly notify the government about potential problems with accelerator pedals.

headline.main: U.S. Is Seeking a Fine of $16.4 Million Against Toyota
headline.print_headline: U.S. Is Seeking Maximum Fine Against Toyota
